# SecondLook Positioning

## Category
AI-powered inventory management for thrift retail

## Competitive Alternatives
- Manual sorting (status quo)
- GoodSort (workflow optimization without AI)
- Generic POS systems

## Differentiators
- Real-time CV identification
- Regional pricing intelligence

## Best Customer
Independent thrift store owners processing 100+ donations daily

conversation.content: I think our competitive alternatives list is too narrow. We're only comparing to other software, but most stores just use experienced staff. How should we think about that?
That makes sense. Now update the competitive alternatives section to include what you just described, and adjust the differentiators to be more specific about why we win against each alternative.
